Welcome! 

***Our mission is to build a supportive and inclusive community where students and professionals can grow their geospatial skills together.***

We run **monthly skill sharing tutorial sessions** where a member of our community teaches us something they have learned along the way.

## Upcoming Workshop {style="padding-top: 7px;"}

R Spatial basics with Dr. Christina Buelow and a problem solving session!

Christina will be covering the below [content](https://cabuelow.quarto.pub/r-for-mapping-and-more/). Download the code and data [here](https://github.com/cabuelow/R-spatial-2022).

**March 23rd, 2023 2-4pm AEST**

Want to get access to the online workshop link? Email us at: uqgeo.community \@ gmail dot com
